blogs.title: Advanced CSS Techniques and Best Practices
blogs.description: Discover advanced CSS techniques including Grid, Flexbox, custom properties, and modern layout methods. Learn how to create responsive designs that work across all devices and browsers.

blogs.title: JavaScript ES6+ Features You Should Know
blogs.description: Explore the latest JavaScript features including arrow functions, destructuring, async/await, modules, and more. Stay up-to-date with modern JavaScript development practices.

blogs.title: Building Custom WordPress Themes from Scratch
blogs.description: Learn how to create custom WordPress themes from the ground up. This tutorial covers PHP basics, template hierarchy, custom post types, and theme development best practices.

blogs.title: Responsive Design Principles and Techniques
blogs.description: Master the art of responsive web design with mobile-first approach, flexible grids, and adaptive images. Learn how to create websites that look great on any device.

blogs.title: CSS Animation and Transition Masterclass
blogs.description: Create stunning animations and smooth transitions with CSS. Learn keyframes, transforms, and performance optimization techniques for better user experience.
